did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.physdesc: This collection consists of one large bound daybook.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Milling Company Daybook, Collection #2081, Special Collections, Carrier Library, James Madison University, Harrisonburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Purchased from Bookworm & Silverfish in Feb. 1998.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Daybook of a milling company (no identification) in Woodstock, VA, March 31, 1891-Dec. 10, 1891. Entries were made daily by name of both individuals and businesses and are for "Elect," "bran," "champ," as well as "fert," "coal," and other terms. There are occasional references to "Mill no. 1" and "Mill no. 2".
